gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.note: Select a thumbnail to change the background image.

section.name: Introduction
section.copy:
Welcome to the resource that is Original Technical Publications for Volvo. Carefully reproduced from our extensive historical archive in Gothenburg, we are pleased to give you access to the original Volvo publications needed to run and maintain your classic Volvo car, including parts catalogues and service manuals.
What's more, on this site you can find information and links to Volvo Car Corporation, Volvo Cars Heritage, the Volvo Museum and Original Technical Publications. Discover more about the history of Volvo Cars, the Volvo Models and get the latest Heritage News and Information. From here you can also find Genuine Classic Parts and links to local Volvo Clubs.
While you're visiting, check out the latest picture galleries, video and media archives - even download classic Volvo wallpaper to personalise your computer.
Use Alt + Tab to return to the main menu from the secure reader at any time.

section.name: IMPORTANT INFORMATION ABOUT USING THIS PRODUCT:
section.copy:
To protect the rights of the Volvo Archive, all of the Original Technical Publications material is presented using a protected format (PDC). To open the files you will need to install the PDC Viewer software on your computer and activate your product license. The documents will not be accessible until you have performed these actions:
1) Click the link below to begin online activation. An Internet connection is required for this process.
2) Please insert your name and valid e-mail address plus your activation key, which you will find on the product packaging, then click 'Activate'. Shortly thereafter you will receive an e-mail to the e-mail address you provided, with your license file (.llv) attached and a link to download the PDC Viewer software for Mac or Windows PC.
3) Save the license file in an appropriate folder on your hard drive and install the Viewer software. Once installed double-click on the license file to complete registration. You should receive confirmation, after which you will be free to access documents at your leisure.

section.name: Volvo Technical Publications
section.copy:
The technical publications stored in this section come from the official Volvo Archive in Gothenburg. Where better to discover the best, most comprehensive and most accurate information about your classic Volvo?
Volvo Spare Parts and Service Publications were created to assist Volvo's workshops in giving the very best service to Volvo owners. The publications provide classic Volvo owners all the information needed to maintain their vehicles in the very best condition.

section.name: Parts Publications
section.copy:
Spare Parts Publications - The Spare Parts Publications found here have been compiled and reproduced from the original volumes contained within the Volvo Archive at Gothenburg. The majority of the information is in Swedish and English, though Parts Information has been included in other languages when available.
Where this has not been possible we try to provide English versions of the documents with translations linked to the appropriate pages. Later books include numbered illustrations - guiding readers to the correct illustration and part number.

section.name: Service Publications
section.copy: Service Publications - The Service Publications found here have been compiled and reproduced from the original volumes contained within the Volvo Archive at Gothenburg. Each publication includes comprehensive, multi-lingual service information used by Volvo workshops for models that were current or still in service at that time.

section.name: Volvo Car Corporation
section.copy: Find the latest information about current Volvo models, find your closest dealership or take part in the Volvo Community at Volvo Cars' website.

section.name: Volvo Cars Community
section.copy: Take part in the Volvo Cars Community.

section.name: DRIVe - Environmental Programme
section.copy: The cars of today face environmental challenges. Take part in their development on the DRIVe homepage.

section.name: Accessories
section.copy: Accessorise your Volvo and put a personal touch to it. We offer a wide range of accessories, devices and services that help you get the most out of your car.

section.name: Global Collection
section.copy: Explore the range of distinctive lifestyle accessories.

section.name: Volvo Merchandise North America
section.copy: Explore the range of distinctive lifestyle accessories.

section.name: Dealer Locator
section.copy: Find a Volvo dealership in your area.

section.name: Visit Volvo
section.copy: Welcome to the Volvo Cars Visitor Centre, located at the heart of the Torslanda plant in Gothenburg, Sweden.

section.name: Current Volvo Models
section.copy: Take a closer look on the current range of Volvos.

section.name: Volvo on Facebook
section.copy: You can join Volvo on Facebook

section.name: Volvo on Youtube
section.copy: Watch relevant videos, pr-productions, commercials and more on the official Youtube site.

section.name: Volvo Cars Heritage
section.copy: With each turn of an odometer wheel, history is being written into each and every Volvo car - and each has a story worth preserving. Since 1927 Volvo has been creating its own unique automotive story and with the Volvo Cars Heritage website, we aim to help enthusiasts keep making history long into the future.

section.name: Volvo Museum
section.copy: The Volvo Museum invites you to explore Volvo's development and successes ? from the end of the 1920s to the present ? under one roof in Gothenburg, Sweden. Find out how classical values have been refined to make Volvo one of the world's most powerful and respected brand names.

section.name: Volvo Models
section.copy: Here you find photos and data of all Volvo models from 1927 to the current model range.

section.name: Volvo Heritage News and Information
section.copy: Visit the News and Information section of the Volvo Heritage pages to update yourself on what is happening in terms of Volvo car anniversaries, news items of general interest and important dates to remember.

section.name: Volvo Clubs
section.copy: Searching for your local Volvo club? Use this link to find Volvo clubs and societies on the Volvo Cars Heritage website.

section.name: Picture Galleries
section.copy: This field is ignored when using the photo gallery pane type.

section.name: Wallpapers
section.copy:
Personalise your PC with Volvo Cars Heritage wallpaper. No paste necessary, simply make your selection and leave us to do the decorating.
High quality prints are available from our friends at volvoprints.com

section.name: Volvo Video Archives
section.copy:
Feeling nostalgic about your Volvo? Visit our online video archive for TV and film commercials and our range of historic Volvo film clips.
All of the video clips have been selected from the Volvo Archive in Gothenborg.

section.name: Other Volvo Related Links
section.copy:
Around the globe, a growing band of enthusiasts, clubs and businesses all have a hand in keeping classic Volvo cars on the road. We are pleased to include links to many of our partners and friends who contribute to, and participate in, the growing Volvo community.
Please note that we are not responsible for any information found on third party websites, nor can we accept responsibility for any incident or problem arising from their use. Links found on this section do not imply any kind of approval or arrangement between those third parties and Volvo Car Corporation or any of its subsidiaries.

section.name: Technical Information Shop
section.copy: Visit the Technical Information Shop to purchase owner's manuals, wiring diagrams and other printed products.

section.name: Technical & Owner Bookstore
section.copy: Visit the Technical & Owner Bookstore to purchase owner's manuals and service information.

section.name: Original Technical Publications
section.copy:
Original Technical Publications is proud to have been selected by Volvo Cars Heritage to work alongside staff at the Volvo Archive in digitising, reproducing and presenting the vast wealth of historic documents on behalf of Volvo customers.
It is our aim to provide Volvo owners with a service befitting the quality and ethos of Volvo.
Here you will find a unique, comprehensive, information-rich technical resource. Original Technical Publications will help you discover everything you need to know about maintaining and caring for your classic Volvo. Indeed, whatever Volvo published for your car, you'll find it reproduced here.
